tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Customers (
	customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(255),
	savings_plan VARCHAR(50),
	monthly_savings_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	behavior_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  savings_plan VARCHAR(50)
)
